turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I know there is a lot on the schedule today but I really need a cup of Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where are you I will order from the closest store.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am headed to the Ameristar Casino in St Charles with a client.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok head to 5th and Boonslick and it will be ready.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Order 2 caffe mochas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size, milk type etc?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: both Grande. One with 2% and one with almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How about some whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is that extra?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: a small charge.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, wait he says he wants non fat now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I am ready to make the order. Any other changes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That should do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I am sending you directions to 5th and Boonslick. Your coffee should be ready in 5 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 5th and boonslick. No need for the directions

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: disregard my message then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Will I need to pay at the store.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I used your starbucks account. it is all taken care of.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Let me know if you need anything else.
